pages.title: Common Brimstone
pages.text: Gonepteryx rhamni ($(o)known as the common brimstone$()) is a butterfly of the family Pieridae.$(br2)It lives throughout the Palearctic zone and is commonly found across Europe, Asia, and North Africa.

pages.title: Common Brimstone
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
